goal.en: Report and discuss the research papers. Let the students understand the latest research papers of Water Resources Engineering.
goal.ch: 報告、討論水資源工程最新的研究論文，使得修課的學生瞭解水資源工程最新的研究。

content.en: Guest speakers and students discuss the latest research papers of Water Resources Engineering.
content.ch: Guest speakers and student reports of the latest research topics in the area of Water Resources Engineering.

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment
